page.title: 18CLAREMONT FARM
page.content: This is the only farm remaining in the area covered. The farm's emphasis is on mixed agriculture. The first thing the farmer does when he gets up at 6.00 a.m.is milk the cows. His farm grows strawberries, raspberries, gooseberries, cabbage, lettuce, onions, cauliflower and potatoes for local sale. In the Autumn he grows wheat and oats with the best potatoes harvested in Autumn. The frost helps to break up the heavy soil. The farm employs six people, though extra labour has to be hired at certain times, especially for ploughing. The farm uses four tractors.
